name: Great update! One thing you should consider is moving to a self-hosted analytics package. I’m using Fathom, and it’s solid. Gives me what I need and respects my privacy and that of others.

content.html: Great update! One thing you should consider is moving to a self-hosted analytics package. I’m using Fathom, and it’s solid. Gives me what I need and respects my privacy and that of others.
